title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

tosdr.case: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy states: "To be able to offer our products and services for free, we serve third-party ads of advertising companies in our products for mobile devices. To enable the ad, we embed a software development kit (“SDK”) provided by an advertising company into the product, which then collects Personal Data in order to personalize ads for you."
